definition: to storm a strategic pass/fig. to tackle a key problem
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve

sentences.english: We brainstormed for most of the afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 下午的大部分时间我们都在开献策攻关会。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the solution to the problem of combing drawing-off roller licked by linen.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了对亚麻精梳机引出罗拉缠麻问题的攻关改造。

sentences.english: The Chinese database of feed is a national key problem within the 7th five-year plan.
sentences.chinese: 中国饲料数据库是“七五”国家攻关课题。

sentences.english: Meanwhile , henry company undertake multiple province and city key scientific and technical tackle - key - problem plan project also.
sentences.chinese: 同时，亨利公司还承担着多项省市科技攻关计划项目。

sentences.english: These can provide useful help to west east gas transmitting project research.
sentences.chinese: 为西气东输工程技术攻关课题研究提供有益的帮助。

sentences.english: The development of Gear Shaper Cutter (GSC) CAD system has been a project in the machinery manufacturing corp.
sentences.chinese: 插齿刀CAD系统一直是机械加工企业的攻关课题。

sentences.english: The nature of research evidence is the most important research objects.
sentences.chinese: 其中证本质研究又是最主要的攻关对象。

sentences.english: The canopy sample is the important and surmount subject of Hongdu Aviation Industry Group.
sentences.chinese: 座舱盖数控样件是洪都航空工业集团的重点攻关项目。

sentences.english: The general investigation to danger sources is one of major subjects approved by National Science Committee during period of "Eighth Five Year's Plan ."
sentences.chinese: 危险源普查工作是国家科委批准的“八五”攻关课题。

sentences.english: Through research and test, the self-reliance manufacturing for the core barrel of pressure water reactor internals has been realized.
sentences.chinese: 通过攻关试验，实现了压水堆吊篮筒体国产化。

sentences.english: Fourthly, stepping up critical SARS research and exploring effective methods of diagnosis and treatment.
sentences.chinese: 四是加强科研攻关，研究有效诊治办法。

definition: to tackle a thorny problem and overcome its challenges
to try out a new product (or manufacturing process)/prototype/trial product
to explore/to survey/to prospect (for oil etc)/prospecting
to assault a fortified position/(fig.) to concentrate one's efforts on a particularly difficult part of one's mission
State Key Laboratories (university laboratories in PRC supported by the central government)
pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Zhong4 dian3 Shi2 yan4 shi4
